verses.text: \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Israel, \w come|strong="H5307"\w* back \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* evil-doing \w has|strong="H0430"\w* been \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cause \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* words, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, Let \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* forgiveness \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* wrongdoing, \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* payment \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* lips.

Assyria \w will|strong="H3068"\w* not \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* salvation; \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* not \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* horses; \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* not \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* hands, \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* gods; \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* child \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* father.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w put|strong="H7392"\w* right \w their|strong="H5921"\w* errors; freely \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w love|strong="H7355"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wrath \w is|strong="H0834"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5750"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dew \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Israel; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* flowers \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* lily, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* send \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* roots \w like|strong="H7725"\w* Lebanon.

\w His|strong="H1961"\w* branches \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* stretched out, \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* beautiful \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* olive-tree \w and|strong="H3478"\w* sweet-smelling \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

They \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* back \w and|strong="H1935"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* shade; \w their|strong="H1961"\w* life \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* new \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* grain, \w and|strong="H1935"\w* they \w will|strong="H1961"\w* put out flowers \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* vine; \w his|strong="H1961"\w* name \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* wine \w of|strong="H1961"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* Ephraim, what \w has|strong="H1612"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* do \w with|strong="H3427"\w* false gods any longer? \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w have|strong="H1612"\w* given \w an|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w will|strong="H3844"\w* keep watch over \w him|strong="H7725"\w*; \w I|strong="H6738"\w* am \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H7725"\w* branching fir-tree, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* comes \w your|strong="H7725"\w* fruit.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* wise \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w see|strong="H7789"\w* these things; \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* good sense \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*. \w For|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* ways \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* Lord \w are|strong="H4100"\w* straight, \w and|strong="H0669"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w upright|strong="H4480"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* go \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*, \w but|strong="H6030"\w* sinners \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* falling \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*.
